text: is a train station on the Osaka Metro Midosuji Line located in Kita-ku, Sakai, Osaka, Japan. ==Lines== *Osaka Metro Midosuji Line (Station Number: M28) ==Layout== ==Stations next to Kita-Hanada== |- !colspan=5|Osaka Metro Category:Osaka Metro stations Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1987
title: Kitahanada Station
